DataElement.preferredName: Person Height Integer::0 Decimal Place Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The 0 decimal place numeric value that describes the height of an individual.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The vertical distance from the base to the top of an individual.

Property.preferredDefinition: The vertical measurement or distance from the base to the top of an object; the vertical dimension of extension.

Concepts.definition: The vertical measurement or distance from the base to the top of an object; the vertical dimension of extension.

DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 7/6/23 used in an NCI Standard CDE; chg RS to Standard and txfr ownership to NCI Standards to support DSS reuse. jk

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical result of the determination of the vertical distance of an individual._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::0_An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: general description of an individual's physical appearance and vital status.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Height; the vertical dimension of extension; distance from the base of something to the top.:A number with no fractional part.::0:An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: The vertical measurement or distance from the base to the top of an object; the vertical dimension of extension.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
